value.name: With Rivals in Trouble, Can Wiley Consolidate Progressives?
value.description: Moderate candidates Eric Adams and Andrew Yang have been leading in the Democratic mayoral primary while two prominent progressives, Dianne Morales and Scott Stringer, have stumbled.
